product_name: Timex Ironman 30-Lap Rugged Digital Watch - Men's
long_description: The iconic Timex Ironman 30-Lap Rugged Digital Watch provides standard functions for athletes at any level. 30-Lap memory recall; 100-hr. chronograph with lap/split data. 24-hr. countdown timer; 3 time zones; 15 preset occasion reminders. INDIGLO night light; top start/split push button for easy operation; durable, lightweight resin case and strap. The Timex Ironman 30-Lap Rugged Digital Watch is water-resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The iconic Timex Ironman 30-Lap Rugged Digital Watch provides standard functions for athletes at any level.
